content: mckenna is a pair of fingerless mitts knit with berroco ultra alpaca chunky featuring a simple pair of cable columns running up the back of the hand these would also make great gifts **finished measurements** approximately 8 around x 7½ long **yarn** berroco ultra alpaca chunky 100 grs 1 hank #72193 starry night mix **needles and notions** 1 set each double-pointed needles sizes 9 5 50 mm and 10 6 00 mm or size to obtain gauge cable needle cn 5 stitch markers 1 a different color for beg-of-round 2 stitch holders **gauge** 14 sts and 20 rnds = 4 in reverse st st on larger needles
